title: MedXpress
description: Welcome to MedXpress, an Angular-based web application designed to streamline the interaction between customers and shops in the medical supply domain.

bullets.point: Developed a durable, user-friendly application, prioritizing efficiency.
Ensured consistent design coherence for a visually pleasing interface.
Implemented secure authentication on both Angular and NestJS.
Established a detailed product catalog for informed decision-making.
Engineered a seamless cart feature for easy item management.
Executed a secure checkout process for a smooth user experience.
Introduced an admin panel for efficient order management.
Enhanced user experience with Progressive Web App (PWA) functionality.

title: Rick and Morty Wiki
description: A comprehensive website dedicated to the TV show "Rick and Morty" that provides:

bullets.point: Detailed information about all the characters, including their current status.
Section highlighting the last episode in which they were seen.
Intuitive search function and user-friendly navigation.
Episode summaries, air dates, and other details to enhance the overall viewing experience.
Optimized for mobile devices

title: Personal Portfolio
description: My personal portfolio website! Explore my achievements, skills, and creative projects. Let's connect and create something remarkable together.

bullets.point: Build using react.
Simple and minimal design.
All of my projects are listed.
Used bootstrap and sass for responsive.
Optimized for mobile devices.

title: TO-DO
description: To-do is a must app in which offer a way to increase productivity, stopping you from forgetting things, helps prioritise tasks, manage tasks effectively, use time wisely

bullets.point: Add a new to-do
Update the exiting to-do
Delete a to-do
While adding or deleting to-do shows a fluent animation.

title: Tic Tac Toe
description: Tic-tac-toe, noughts and crosses, or Xs and Os is a paper-and-pencil game for two players who take turns marking the spaces in a three-by-three grid with X or O.

bullets.point: The game is designed using CSS grid that's 3 squares by 3 squares.
Players have option to enter name befor starting the game.
Once player won shows an celebration message.
